info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 9 at 11:37AM EDT until April 13 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana and Kentucky...
Ohio River at Clifty Creek affecting Trimble and Jefferson Counties.
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower affecting Meade, Clark, Harrison, Hardin, Floyd and Jefferson Counties.
Ohio River at McAlpine Upper affecting Jefferson, Oldham, Floyd and Clark Counties.
Ohio River at Cannelton Lock and Dam affecting Perry, Breckinridge, Crawford and Hancock Counties.
Ohio River at Tell City affecting Perry and Hancock Counties.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at McAlpine Upper.
* WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Parts of Utica IN flood. Third Street ramp off of I-64 closes. 10th Streets is closed at floodgate. At 30.0 feet, Utica Pike floods at Duffy's Landing in Jeffersonville. At 32.0 feet, 2nd Street is floodgate is closed. At 34.0 feet, Bingham Way is closed at floodgate. Water floods East Riverside Road near Fisherman's Wharf in Jeffersonville. At 37.0 feet, 6th and 8th Street floodgates are closed. Ali Center and 2nd Street bridge floodgates are closed.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 36.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.8 feet later today. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.7 feet on 02/26/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 545 AM EDT /445 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Clark, IN; Floyd, IN; Jefferson, KY; Oldham, KY
